p: The optimization selected Athena data from HHS region 8, Illinois, and Georgia, from among all 435 Athena candidate time series. To assess the value of such local, state and regional data, we conducted an additional experiment, restricting the selection to only US-level candidate data sources. The resulting system includes two national Athena data sources (i.e., absolute and percent ILI visits across all facilities) and WordPress flu activity ( Table 1). It yields better forecasts than the public health baselines, but is inferior to the optimized system that includes state and regional data.
